MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL23 postcode area of Bala. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.30am due to tree cutting. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.28am on 29th of April 2021.
